name: Your account can be terminated at any time for any reason

tosdr.tldr: Grammarly may deny you access with or without prior notice if you engage in any conduct that Grammarly determines, in its sole discretion, violate their Terms or the rights of Grammarly or any third party. This includes exceeding their usage limits of 30 days and 24 hours.
